name: B. Expansion coefficient of the array
statement:
Let’s call an array of non-negative integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n a k-extension for some non-negative integer k if for all
possible pairs of indices 1
leq i, j
leq n the inequality k
cdot |i - j|
leq min(a_i, a_j) is satisfied. The expansion coefficient of the array a
is the maximal integer k such that the array a is a k-extension. Any
array is a 0-expansion, so the expansion coefficient always exists.You
are given an array of non-negative integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n. Find its expansion coefficient.
